name: Cyberbird
description:
CONTROLS - IMPORTANT, READ.
  • WASD move 
  • Hold Q to view bird's cam when bird goes into the teleport crystal 
  • press E to teleport to higher ground when the bird goes into the crystal
  • Right click to slow down time
  • Left click to deflect bullets when bullets are close 
  • Keep your balance on the hoverboard or you will die
LORE


A mysterious bird has entered MC's life! 
Help him find the reason to his connection with the bird as he escapes the facility. Enjoy the smooth synthwave tunes and have the ride of your life!
